scripts.pack: yarn build && claudia pack --source dist --output dist/gittrends-serverless-api.zip --no-optional-dependencies
scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc && cp package.json dist/package.json && yarn dotenv-to-json
scripts.deploy: yarn build && claudia create --source dist --region us-east-1 --handler lambda.handler --set-env-from-json dist/env.json --config .claudia.json --deploy-proxy-api --no-optional-dependencies
scripts.update: yarn build && claudia update --source dist --update-env-from-json dist/env.json --config .claudia.json --no-optional-dependencies
